explains: adv. 可怕地；冷酷地；严格地

sentences.en: 'It won't be easy,' he said grimly.
He notes grimly that the Watsons have called the vet to put their dog out of its misery.
sentences.cn: 他难过地记录下沃森家已经给兽医打了电话，要永远结束他们家狗的痛苦。

sentences.en: The pirates listened grimly, and then replaced the mushroom.
sentences.cn: 海盗们阴着脸听着，然后把蘑菇放回原处。
